title: Ardent Censor and Redemption
body: So i've seen alot of heal-based supports go both ardent censor and redemption even though they clearly say the heal/shield boost is unique and therefore cannot stack with each other. Why do people still get both? Am I messing out on something, if so, what?

replies.body: Since it is not a named passive, the unique merely prevents the same item stacking with itself.  It will still stack with any other {{item:3114}} item.  If it was Unique - Healing Power - 10% bonus healing/shielding (or something), it would not stack.  However, since it is not named, it doesn't prevent them from stacking additively.  [Wikia ](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Ardent_Censer) confirmed this as well.  See the "Lifeline" passive from {{item:3156}} and {{item:3053}}.

Plus {{item:3107}} is just so damn efficient that even if you do not have shielding in your kit, you get that item anyway.  Every support gets {{item:3107}} (except the AP mages like {{champion:63}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:143}}).  Even {{champion:89}} will get {{item:3107}}.  It is just so good that even just buffing only locket {{item:3190}} is absolutely fine.  Its inherit synergism with its own active is amazing.
I get {{item:3107}} on {{champion:143}}  as 3rd item if slightly ahead and 4th if even or behind.  Only if way ahead and just having fun do I go for all offensive items.

You can technically stack {{item:3114}} {{item:3222}} {{item:3504}} {{item:3107}}  and windspeaker's blessing for a total of 58% increased healing.  If the receiver of the heal also has runic armor and spirit visage it becomes 110% increased healing.
So thats how Janna healed for 1k health from just her ult
i got {{item:3107}} and sold my {{item:3050}} then we lost our last time fight
yes clearly this means we need to buff fizz

Yes, you are. Nameless unique effects, like the healing bonus from Redemption and Ardent Censer or the lethality from lethality items, do stack with other passives from different items, but not from the same item. In other words, if you have Redemption and Censer, you get 20% increased healing, but if you have 2 Redemptions, you only get 10%.
